      • getTopPosts

        public org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Post> getTopPosts​()
        Returns the homepage top posts.
        Returns:
        Slice containing top posts

      • createPost

        public void createPost​(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String summary,
                       java.lang.String article,
                       java.lang.String cats,
                       org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile,
                       User author)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and adds the post to the site.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the post
        summary - the summary of the post
        article - the main article of the post
        cats - comma-separated categories of the post
        multipartFile - the image or video of the post
        author - the user who is trying to create the post
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if execution of multipartFile.getBytes() is not successful

      • findPostByUrl

        public java.util.Optional<Post> findPostByUrl​(java.lang.String url)
        returns Optional containing the post or empty if the post was not found.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to find post by
        Returns:
        Optional containing the post or empty if the post was not found

      • likePost

        public void likePost​(long postId,
                     User user,
                     boolean like)
        Likes or dislikes the specified post.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to be liked/disliked
        user - the user who is trying to like/dislike the post
        like - true if it's like, false if dislike

      • addComment

        public void addComment​(long postId,
                       User user,
                       java.lang.String comment)
        Adds comment to the specified post.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to add comment to
        user - the commenter
        comment - the user comment

      • getPinnedPosts

        @Cacheable("pinnedPosts")
public org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Post> getPinnedPosts​()
        Returns pinned posts and caches them in pinnedPosts cache.
        Returns:
        Slice containing pinned posts

      • pinPost

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames="pinnedPosts",
            allEntries=true)
public boolean pinPost​(long postId,
                       User user)
        Pins the specified post to the homepage of the site.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to pin
        user - the user who is trying to pin the post
        Returns:
        true if the post was pinned, false if unpinned

      • deletePost

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames="pinnedPosts",
            allEntries=true)
public void deletePost​(long postId,
                       User user)
        Deletes the specified post from the site.

        If the deletion succeeds then the pinnedPosts cache is evicted.

        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to be deleted
        user - the user who is trying to delete the post

      • reportPost

        public void reportPost​(long postId)
        Sets the reported flag of the post to true.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to set its reported flag

      • getFile

        @Cacheable(cacheNames="postFiles")
public java.util.Optional<File> getFile​(long postId)
        Gets the file (image or video) of the post.

        The file is cached in the postFiles cache for a predefined period of time.

        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to get its file
        Returns:
        Optional containing the file if post exists and empty otherwise
